name: Served Plated to Each Guest
description: It is a common service offered by the hotel. Each plate is arranged accordingly by the chef and is given out to customers.

name: Table díHote
description: It is a catering service that serves warmth and generosity. The chef will display the prepared food on the table, and the guests will fall in line to get the food that they want to eat.

name: Russian Service
description: This type gives a comfortable aura to the venue as the catering staff will give and present the food on the tray. The guests will be the one to get the food and drinks on the tray.

name: French Service
description: This service is perfect for formal presentations and fine dining events.Each waiter has his own responsibility. Since they have their own responsibilities, your guests don't need to approach the long table to get the food as it will come to you.

name: Traditional Buffet
description: It is a bigger version of table díhote catering service as it provides several tables for each course. There are tables for appetizers, for main courses, and for desserts. You just have to approach the table that offers the food you want to eat.

name: Open House
description: It is a popular choice of many organizers as it offers food and drinks throughout the party.
